acceptance-test-run.title: Podam should handle both native and wrapped short values with @PodamShortValue annotation
acceptance-test-run.name: podamShouldHandleShortValuesWithThePodamShortValueAnnotation

test-step.description: When I invoke the factory manufacturing for class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.annotations.ShortValuePojo
Then the Object should not be null
Then the value 0 should be greater or equal than 0
Then the short value 85 should be lower or equal than 100
Then the short value 47 should be between 0 and 1000
Then the Object should not be null
Then the value 0 should be greater or equal than 0
Then the Object should not be null
Then the short value 93 should be lower or equal than 100
Then the Object should not be null
Then the short value 87 should be between 0 and 100
Then the short value 17 should be precisely 17
